title: FOREIGN TALENT BRANDS S'PORE CHINESE AS "YELLOW BABOONS" & BAD QUALITY DRIVERS
text:
FOREIGN TALENT BRANDS S'PORE CHINESE AS "YELLOW BABOONS"& BAD QUALITY DRIVERS   
Dear All Singapore Stuff, Advertisement 
Please see the screenshot attached. This bangladeshi foreigner who is working as a Director of Technical Operations at Acentra Networks Singapore has made seditious comments about Singaporean Chinese. 
According to the screenshot of his comment on The Straits Times facebook page, he said that Singaporean Chinese are "Yellow Baboons and bad quality drivers". 
How dare he make such a derogatory remark about the people who let him come here to work? This racist bangla should be deported at once! 
Here is his facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/ceder.ahmed 
Benny A.S.S. Contributor Editor's Note: 
If not, why not give us a 'Like' ? Filed Under:
